amendment.description: To provide a sense of the Senate that dedicated funding for coding courses in kindergarten through grade 12 education should be a top priority.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3908 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3908 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5903; text: CR S5903) To provide a sense of the Senate that dedicated funding for coding courses in kindergarten through grade 12 education should be a top priority.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3908 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cantwell to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3908 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
